Text: Hey nw this is confusing??!! Isnt this supos to be season 7.. I suppose there were 4 movies broadcasted as 16 episodes, which was th 6th season.. Isnt it ? or this is the 6th season...

Season 6 will air on Comedy Central. 26 episdoes will be made but only 12 of these will be counted as Season 6. The remaining ones will be Season 7.

Season 6 is the new season.
Oh i see..!! Bt do u have th Futurama movies?? hv u uploaded that ??
20/40 are you going to do higher res versions once it screens on air tomorrow? This file size is quite small lol.

@jjabrams: HighRes source is not available. DVD has 720x480 and qualifies for max. 480p.
In cases of animated shows I consider as stupid to upscale the source only for "Pee"-sake... and it is - a SCREENER only. 320p is certainly most appropriate. If you NEED 32 pixels more - download XviD - 175 MB a piece... LOL.
@jjabrams: Oh, not to forget: I never encode the same episodes twice if airing follows DVDSCR version. I told you that regarding Party Down DVDSCR for eps 1. and 2.
ok np 20/40 - I assume you will be doing the rest of the season in 320p also?
